body_html: Most of the CPU to GPU and GPU to CPU copies come from the fact that the exponential moving average variables are all placed on CPU, which causes a lot of small data transfers. Can you try to move it to GPU and see if that helps reduce the likelihood of the GPU hanging ? It will also help the model train faster.

body: Most of the CPU to GPU and GPU to CPU copies come from the fact that the exponential moving average variables are all placed on CPU, which causes a lot of small data transfers. Can you try to move it to GPU and see if that helps reduce the likelihood of the GPU hanging ? It will also help the model train faster.
